original: 1. Sambodhivagga
analyzed: sambodhi vagga

original: Sambodhisutta
analyzed: sambodhi sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “Sace, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṁ puccheyyuṁ:
analyzed: sace bhikkhave añña titthiyāḥ paribbājakāḥ evam puccheyyu

original: ‘sambodhipakkhikānaṁ, āvuso, dhammānaṁ kā upanisā bhāvanāyā’ti, evaṁ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṁ aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ kinti byākareyyāthā”ti?
analyzed: sambodhi pakkhikāna āvuso dhammānam kā upanisā bhāvanāya ati evam puṭṭhāḥ tumhe bhikkhave tesam añña titthiyānam paribbājakānam kinti byākareyyātha ati

original: “Bhagavaṁmūlakā no, bhante, dhammā …pe… bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
analyzed: bhagava mūlakāḥ no bhante dhammāḥ pe bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressanti iti

original: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha; bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi bhikkhave suṇātha sādhukam manasi karotha bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Sace, bhikkhave, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā evaṁ puccheyyuṁ:
analyzed: sace bhikkhave añña titthiyāḥ paribbājakāḥ evam puccheyyu

original: ‘sambodhipakkhikānaṁ, āvuso, dhammānaṁ kā upanisā bhāvanāyā’ti, evaṁ puṭṭhā tumhe, bhikkhave, tesaṁ aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ evaṁ byākareyyātha:
analyzed: sambodhi pakkhikānaṃ āvuso dhammānam kā upanisā bhāvanāya ati evam puṭṭhāḥ tumhe bhikkhave tesam añña titthiyānam paribbājakānam evam byākareyyātha

original: ‘Idhāvuso, bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto hoti kalyāṇasahāyo kalyāṇasampavaṅko.
analyzed: idha āvuso bhikkhu kalyāṇa mittaḥ hoti kalyāṇa sahāyaḥ kalyāṇa sampavaṅkaḥ

original: Sambodhipakkhikānaṁ, āvuso, dhammānaṁ ayaṁ paṭhamā upanisā bhāvanāya.
analyzed: sambodhi pakkhikānaṃ āvuso dhammānam ayam paṭhamā upanisā bhāvanāya

original: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
analyzed: puna caparaḥ āvuso bhikkhu sīlavā hoti pātimokkha savara savutaḥ viharati ācāra gocara sampannaḥ aṇumattesu vajjesu bhaya dassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu

original: Sambodhipakkhikānaṁ, āvuso, dhammānaṁ ayaṁ dutiyā upanisā bhāvanāya.
analyzed: sambodhi pakkhikānaṃ āvuso dhammānam ayam dutiyā upanisā bhāvanāya

original: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu yāyaṁ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā, seyyathidaṁ—appicchakathā
analyzed: puna caparaḥ āvuso bhikkhu yā ayam kathā abhisallekhikā cetaḥ vivaraṇa sappāyā seyyathida appiccha kathā

original: paññākathā vimuttikathā vimuttiñāṇadassanakathā, evarūpiyā kathāya nikāmalābhī hoti
analyzed: paññā kathā vimutti kathā vimutti ñāṇa dassana kathā evarūpiyā kathāya nikāma lābhī hoti

original: akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
analyzed: a kiccha lābhī a kasira lābhī

original: Sambodhipakkhikānaṁ, āvuso, dhammānaṁ ayaṁ tatiyā upanisā bhāvanāya.
analyzed: sambodhi pakkhikānaṃ āvuso dhammānam ayam tatiyā upanisā bhāvanāya

original: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu āraddhavīriyo viharati akusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ pahānāya, kusalānaṁ dhammānaṁ upasampadāya, thāmavā daḷhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.

analyzed: sambodhi pakkhikānaṃ āvuso dhammānam ayam catutthī upanisā bhāvanāya

original: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu paññavā hoti udayatthagāminiyā paññāya samannāgato ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyā.
analyzed: puna caparaḥ āvuso bhikkhu paññavā hoti udaya ttha gāminiyā paññāya samannāgataḥ ariyāya nibbedhikāya sammā dukkha kkhaya gāminiyā

original: Sambodhipakkhikānaṁ, āvuso, dhammānaṁ ayaṁ pañcamī upanisā bhāvanāya’.

original: Kalyāṇamittassetaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṁ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa—

analyzed: sīlavā bhavissati pātimokkha savara savutaḥ viharissati ācāra gocara sampannaḥ aṇumattesu vajjesu bhaya dassāvī samādāya sikkhissati sikkhāpadesu

original: Kalyāṇamittassetaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṁ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa—

analyzed: kalyāṇa mittassa ita bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ pāṭikaṅkham kalyāṇa sahāyassa kalyāṇa sampavaṅkassa

analyzed: āraddha vīriyaḥ viharissati akusalānam dhammānam pahānāya kusalānam dhammānam upasampadāya thāmavā daḷha parakkamaḥ a nikkhitta dhuraḥ kusalesu dhammesu

original: Kalyāṇamittassetaṁ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṁ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa—

original: Tena ca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cattāro dhammā uttari bhāvetabbā—

analyzed: nissaya sutta

original: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ …pe… ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:

analyzed: hiriñce bhikkhu bhikkhu nissāya pe

original: Idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhu saṅkhāyekaṁ paṭisevati, saṅkhāyekaṁ adhivāseti, saṅkhāyekaṁ parivajjeti, saṅkhāyekaṁ vinodeti.
analyzed: idha bhikkhu bhikkhu saṅkhāya ekam paṭisevati saṅkhāya ekam adhivāseti saṅkhāya ekam parivajjeti saṅkhāya ekam vinodeti

original: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu nissayasampanno hotī”ti.

original: Meghiyasutta
analyzed: meghiya sutta

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā cālikāyaṁ viharati cālikāpabbate.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā cālikāyam viharati cālikāpabbate

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā meghiyo bhagavato upaṭṭhāko hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā meghiyaḥ bhagavataḥ upaṭṭhākaḥ hoti

original: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā meghiyaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam aṭṭhāsi ekamantam ṭhitaḥ kho āyasmā meghiyaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “icchāmahaṁ, bhante, jantugāmaṁ piṇḍāya pavisitun”ti.
analyzed: icchāmaha bhante jantu gāmam piṇḍāya pavisitunti

original: “Yassadāni tvaṁ, meghiya, kālaṁ maññasī”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ sadāni tva meghiya kālam maññasi iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya jantugāmaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā meghiyaḥ pubbaṇhasamayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya jantugāmam piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīraṁ tenupasaṅkami.
analyzed: jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantaḥ yena kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīram tena upasaṅkami

original: Addasā kho āyasmā meghiyo kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīre jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno ambavanaṁ pāsādikaṁ ramaṇīyaṁ.
analyzed: addasā kho āyasmai meghiyaḥ kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīre jaṅghāvihāram anucaṅkamamānaḥ anuvicaramānaḥ amba vanam pāsādikam ramaṇīya

original: Disvānassa etadahosi:
analyzed: disvānassa etat ahosi

original: “pāsādikaṁ vatidaṁ ambavanaṁ ramaṇīyaṁ, alaṁ vatidaṁ kulaputtassa padhānatthikassa padhānāya.
analyzed: pāsādikam vatidam ambavanam ramaṇīya alam vatidam kula puttassa padhānatthikassa padhānāya

original: Sace maṁ bhagavā anujāneyya, āgaccheyyāhaṁ imaṁ ambavanaṁ padhānāyā”ti.
analyzed: sace mam bhagavā anujāneyyaḥ āgaccheyya aham imam ambavanam padhānāya ati

original: Atha kho āyasmā meghiyo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmai meghiyaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmai meghiyaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “Idhāhaṁ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya jantugāmaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisiṁ.
analyzed: idha aha bhante pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya jantugāmam piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīraṁ tenupasaṅkamiṁ.
analyzed: jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantaḥ yena kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīram tena upasaṅkami

original: Addasaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīre jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno ambavanaṁ pāsādikaṁ ramaṇīyaṁ.
analyzed: addasam kho aha bhante kimikāḷāya nadiyā tīre jaṅghāvihāram anucaṅkamamānaḥ anuvicaramānaḥ amba vanam pāsādikam ramaṇīya

original: Disvāna me etadahosi:
analyzed: disvāna me etadahaḥ usi

original: ‘pāsādikaṁ vatidaṁ ambavanaṁ ramaṇīyaṁ.
analyzed: pāsādikam ambavanam ramaṇīya

original: Alaṁ vatidaṁ kulaputtassa padhānatthikassa padhānāya.
analyzed: alam vatidam kula puttassa padhānatthikassa padhānāya

original: Sace maṁ bhagavā anujāneyya, āgaccheyyāhaṁ imaṁ ambavanaṁ padhānāyā’ti.
analyzed: sace mam bhagavā anujāneyyaḥ āgaccheyya aham imam ambavanam padhānāya ati

original: Sace maṁ bhagavā anujāneyya, gaccheyyāhaṁ taṁ ambavanaṁ padhānāyā”ti.
analyzed: sace mam bhagavā anujāneyya gaccheyya aham tam ambavanam padhānāya ati

original: “Āgamehi tāva, meghiya. Ekakamhi tāva yāva aññopi koci bhikkhu āgacchatī”ti.

original: Dutiyampi kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:

original: “bhagavato, bhante, natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyaṁ, natthi katassa paṭicayo.
analyzed: bhagavataḥ bhante natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīya natthi katassa paṭicayo

original: Mayhaṁ kho pana, bhante, atthi uttari karaṇīyaṁ, atthi katassa paṭicayo.
analyzed: mayham kho pana bhante atthi uttari karaṇīya atthi katassa paṭicayaḥ

original: Sace maṁ bhagavā anujāneyya, gaccheyyāhaṁ taṁ ambavanaṁ padhānāyā”ti.
analyzed: sace mam bhagavā anujāneyya gaccheyya aham tam ambavanam padhānāya ati

original: “Āgamehi tāva, meghiya, ekakamhi tāva yāva aññopi koci bhikkhu āgacchatī”ti.
analyzed: āgamehi tāva meghiya ekakamhi tāva yāva añño api koci bhikkhu āgacchati iti

original: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā meghiyo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: tatiyam pi khalu āyasmai meghiyaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “bhagavato, bhante, natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyaṁ, natthi katassa paṭicayo.
analyzed: bhagavataḥ bhante natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīya natthi katassa paṭicayo

original: Mayhaṁ kho pana, bhante, atthi uttari karaṇīyaṁ, atthi katassa paṭicayo.
analyzed: mayham kho pana bhante atthi uttari karaṇīya atthi katassa paṭicayaḥ

original: Sace maṁ bhagavā anujāneyya, gaccheyyāhaṁ taṁ ambavanaṁ padhānāyā”ti.

original: Aparipakkāya, meghiya, cetovimuttiyā ayaṁ tatiyo dhammo paripakkāya saṁvattati.

original: Kalyāṇamittassetaṁ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkhaṁ kalyāṇasahāyassa kalyāṇasampavaṅkassa:

analyzed: sā iyyathā api bhante rajaḥ haraṇam su cimpi puñchati a su cimpi puñchati gūtha gatam pi

original: muttagatampi … kheḷagatampi … pubbagatampi … lohitagatampi puñchati, na ca tena rajoharaṇaṁ
analyzed: mutta gatam api kheḷa gatam api pubba gatam api lohita gatam api puñchati na ca tena rajaḥ haraṇa

original: aṭṭīyati vā harāyati vā jigucchati vā;
analyzed: aṭṭīyati vā harāyati vā jigucchati vā

original: evamevaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, rajoharaṇasamena cetasā viharāmi vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena.
analyzed: evam evam khalu aha bhante rajaḥ haraṇa samena cetasā viharāmi vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena a byāpajjena

original: Yassa nūna, bhante, kāye kāyagatāsati anupaṭṭhitā assa, so idha aññataraṁ sabrahmacāriṁ āsajja appaṭinissajja cārikaṁ pakkameyya.
analyzed: yassa nūna bhante kāye kāya gatā asati anupaṭṭhitā assa saḥ idha aññataram sabrahmacārim āsajja a paṭinissajja cārikam pakkameyya

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, caṇḍālakumārako vā caṇḍālakumārikā vā kaḷopihattho nantakavāsī gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā pavisanto nīcacittaṁyeva upaṭṭhapetvā pavisati;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhante caṇḍāla kumārakaḥ vā caṇḍāla kumārikā vā kaḷopihatthaḥ nantaka vāsī gāmam vā nigamam vā pavisantaḥ nīca cittayā iva upaṭṭhapetvā pavisati

original: evamevaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, caṇḍālakumārakacaṇḍālakumārikāsamena cetasā viharāmi vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena.
analyzed: evam evam kho aha bhante caṇḍāla kumāraka caṇḍāla kumārikā samena cetasā viharāmi vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena

original: Yassa nūna, bhante, kāye kāyagatāsati anupaṭṭhitā assa, so idha aññataraṁ sabrahmacāriṁ āsajja appaṭinissajja cārikaṁ pakkameyya.
analyzed: yassa nūna bhante kāye kāya gatā asati anupaṭṭhitā assa saḥ idha aññataram sabrahmacārim āsajja a paṭinissajja cārikam pakkameyya

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, usabho chinnavisāṇo sūrato sudanto suvinīto rathiyāya rathiyaṁ siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakaṁ anvāhiṇḍanto na kiñci hiṁsati pādena vā visāṇena vā;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhante usabhaḥ chinna visāṇaḥ sūrataḥ su dantaḥ su vinītaḥ rathiyāya rathiyam siṅghāṭakena siṅghāṭakam anvāhiṇḍantaḥ na kiñci hisati pādena vā visāṇena vā

original: evamevaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, usabhachinnavisāṇasamena cetasā viharāmi vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyāpajjena.
analyzed: evam evam kho aha bhante usabha chinna visāṇa samena cetasā viharāmi vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena a byāpajjena

original: Yassa nūna, bhante, kāye kāyagatāsati anupaṭṭhitā assa, so idha aññataraṁ sabrahmacāriṁ āsajja appaṭinissajja cārikaṁ pakkameyya.
analyzed: yassa nūna bhante kāye kāya gatā asati anupaṭṭhitā assa saḥ idha aññataram sabrahmacārim āsajja a paṭinissajja cārikam pakkameyya

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, itthī vā puriso vā daharo yuvā maṇḍanakajātiko sīsaṁnhāto ahikuṇapena vā kukkurakuṇapena vā manussakuṇapena vā kaṇṭhe āsattena aṭṭīyeyya harāyeyya jiguccheyya;
analyzed: seyyathā api bhante itthī vā purisaḥ vā daharaḥ yuvā maṇḍanaka jātikaḥ sīsa nhātaḥ ahi kuṇapena vā kukkura kuṇapena vā manussa kuṇapena vā kaṇṭhe āsattena aṭṭīyeyya harāyeyya jiguccheyya

original: evamevaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, iminā pūtikāyena aṭṭīyāmi harāyāmi jigucchāmi.
analyzed: evam evam khalu aha bhante iminā pūti kāyena aṭṭīyāmi harāyāmi jigucchāmi

original: Yassa nūna, bhante, kāye kāyagatāsati anupaṭṭhitā assa, so idha aññataraṁ sabrahmacāriṁ āsajja appaṭinissajja cārikaṁ pakkameyya.
analyzed: yassa nūna bhante kāye kāya gatā asati anupaṭṭhitā assa saḥ idha aññataram sabrahmacārim āsajja a paṭinissajja cārikam pakkameyya

original: Seyyathāpi, bhante, puriso medakathālikaṁ parihareyya chiddāvachiddaṁ uggharantaṁ paggharantaṁ;
analyzed: sa iyyathā api bhante purisaḥ medaka thālikam parihareyya chidda avachiddam uggharantam paggharanta

original: evamevaṁ kho ahaṁ, bhante, imaṁ kāyaṁ pariharāmi chiddāvachiddaṁ uggharantaṁ paggharantaṁ.
analyzed: evam evam kho aha bhante imam kāyam pariharāmi chidda avachiddam uggharantam paggharanta

original: Yassa nūna, bhante, kāye kāyagatāsati anupaṭṭhitā assa, so idha aññataraṁ sabrahmacāriṁ āsajja appaṭinissajja cārikaṁ pakkameyyā”ti.
analyzed: yassa nūna bhante kāye kāya gatā asati anupaṭṭhitā assa saḥ idha aññataram sabrahmacārim āsajja a paṭinissajja cārikam pakkameyya ati

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho saḥ bhikkhu uṭṭhāya āsanā ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā bhagavataḥ pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “accayo maṁ, bhante, accagamā yathābālaṁ yathāmūḷhaṁ yathāakusalaṁ, yo ahaṁ āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ asatā tucchā musā abhūtena abbhācikkhiṁ.
analyzed: accayaḥ ma bhante accagamāḥ yathābālam yathāmūḍham yathā akusala yaḥ aham āyasmantam sāriputtam asatā tucchā musā abhūtena abbhā ācikkhi

original: Tassa me, bhante, bhagavā accayaṁ accayato paṭiggaṇhatu āyatiṁ saṁvarāyā”ti.
analyzed: tassa me bhante bhagavā accayam accayataḥ paṭiggaṇhatu āyatim savarāya ati

original: “Taggha taṁ, bhikkhu, accayo accagamā yathābālaṁ yathāmūḷhaṁ yathāakusalaṁ, yo tvaṁ sāriputtaṁ asatā tucchā musā abhūtena abbhācikkhi.
analyzed: tat ha ta bhikkhu accayaḥ acca gamāḥ yathābālam yathāmūḍham yathā akusala tvam sāriputtam asatā tucchā musā abhūtena abbhācikkhi

original: Yato ca kho tvaṁ, bhikkhu, accayaṁ accayato disvā yathādhammaṁ paṭikarosi, taṁ te mayaṁ paṭiggaṇhāma.
analyzed: yatas ca kho tva bhikkhu accayam accayataḥ disvā yathādhammam paṭikarosi tam te mayam paṭiggaṇhāma

original: Vuḍḍhihesā, bhikkhu, ariyassa vinaye yo accayaṁ accayato disvā yathādhammaṁ paṭikaroti āyatiṁ saṁvaraṁ āpajjatī”ti.
analyzed: vuḍḍhi hesā bhikkhu ariyassa vinaye yaḥ accayam accayataḥ disvā yathādhammam paṭikaroti āyatim savaram āpajjati iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ sāriputtaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyasmantam sāriputtam āmantesi

original: “khama, sāriputta, imassa moghapurisassa, purā tassa tattheva sattadhā muddhā phalatī”ti.
analyzed: khama sāriputta imassa moghapurisassa purā tassa tattha iva sattadhā muddhā phalati iti

original: “Khamāmahaṁ, bhante, tassa āyasmato sace maṁ so āyasmā evamāha:
analyzed: khamāmaha bhante tassa āyasmataḥ sace mam saḥ āyasmai evam āha

original: ‘khamatu ca me so āyasmā’”ti.
analyzed: khamatu ca me saḥ

original: Paṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: paṭhama

original: Aṅguttara Nikāya 9.12
analyzed: aṅguttara nikāya

original: 2. Sīhanādavagga
analyzed: sīha nāda vagga

original: Saupādisesasutta
analyzed: saupādisesasutta

analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Atha kho āyasmato sāriputtassa etadahosi:

original: “atippago kho tāva sāvatthiyaṁ piṇḍāya carituṁ,
analyzed: atippago kho tāva sāvatthiyam piṇḍāya caritu

original: yannūnāhaṁ yena aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ ārāmo tenupasaṅkameyyan”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham yena añña titthiyānam paribbājakānam ārāmaḥ tena upasaṅkameyyanti

original: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ ārāmo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā tehi aññatitthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhiṁ sammodi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā sāriputto yena añña titthiyānam paribbājakānam ārāmaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā tehi añña titthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhim sammodi

analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Tena kho pana samayena tesaṁ aññatitthiyānaṁ paribbājakānaṁ sannisinnānaṁ sannipatitānaṁ ayamantarākathā udapādi:

original: “yo hi koci, āvuso, saupādiseso kālaṁ karoti, sabbo so aparimutto nirayā aparimutto tiracchānayoniyā aparimutto pettivisayā aparimutto apāyaduggativinipātā”ti.

analyzed: atha kho aha bhante yena añña titthiyānam paribbājakānam ārāmaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā tehi añña titthiyehi paribbājakehi saddhim sammodi

analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdi

analyzed: yaḥ hi koci āvuso saupādisesaḥ kālam karoti sabbaḥ saḥ a parimuttaḥ nirayāḥ a parimuttaḥ tiracchāna yoniyāḥ a parimuttaḥ petti visayāḥ a parimuttaḥ apāya duggati vinipātā ti

analyzed: atha kho aha bhante tesam añña titthiyānam paribbājakānam bhāsitam na iva abhinandim na paṭikkosi

original: ‘bhagavato santike etassa bhāsitassa atthaṁ ājānissāmī’”ti.
analyzed: bhagavato santike etassa bhāsitassa attham ājānissāmi iti

original: “Ke ca, sāriputta, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā bālā abyattā, ke ca saupādisesaṁ vā ‘saupādiseso’ti jānissanti, anupādisesaṁ vā ‘anupādiseso’ti jānissanti.
analyzed: ke ca sāriputta añña titthiyāḥ paribbājakāḥ bālāḥ abyattāḥ ke ca saupādisesam vā saupādisesaḥ uti jānissanti anupādisesam vā anupādisesaḥ uti jānissanti

original: Navayime, sāriputta, puggalā saupādisesā kālaṁ kurumānā parimuttā nirayā parimuttā tiracchānayoniyā parimuttā pettivisayā parimuttā apāyaduggativinipātā.
analyzed: navayime sāriputta puggalā sa aupādisesā kālam kurumānā parimuttā nirayā parimuttā tiracchāna yoniyā parimuttā petti visayā parimuttā apāya duggati vinipātā

original: Katame nava?
analyzed: katame nava

original: Idha, sāriputta, ekacco puggalo sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṁ paripūrakārī, paññāya mattaso kārī.
analyzed: idha sāriputta ekaccaḥ puggalo sīlesu paripūra kārī hoti samādhismim paripūra kārī paññāya mattaso kārī

original: So pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā antarāparinibbāyī hoti.
analyzed: so pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam parikkhayā antarāparinibbāyī hoti

original: Ayaṁ, sāriputta, paṭhamo puggalo saupādiseso kālaṁ kurumāno parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
analyzed: sāriputta paṭhamaḥ puggalo sa aupādisesaḥ kālam kurumāno parimuttaḥ nirayā parimuttaḥ tiracchāna yoniyā parimuttaḥ petti visayā parimuttaḥ apāya duggati vinipātā

original: Puna caparaṁ, sāriputta, idhekacco puggalo sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṁ paripūrakārī, paññāya mattaso kārī.
analyzed: puna capara sāriputta idha ekaccaḥ puggalo sīlesu paripūra kārī hoti samādhismim paripūra kārī paññāya kārī

original: So pañcannaṁ orambhāgiyānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā upahaccaparinibbāyī hoti …pe…
analyzed: so pañcannam orambhāgiyānam sayojanānam parikkhayā upahacca parinibbāyī hoti pe

original: asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti …pe…
analyzed: asaṅkhāra parinibbāyī hoti pe

original: sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī hoti …pe…
analyzed: sa saṅkhāra parinibbāyī hoti pe

original: uddhaṁsoto hoti akaniṭṭhagāmī.
analyzed: uddhasotaḥ hoti a kaniṭṭha gāmī

original: Ayaṁ, sāriputta, pañcamo puggalo saupādiseso kālaṁ kurumāno parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
analyzed: sāriputta pañcamaḥ puggalo sa aupādisesaḥ kālam kurumāno parimuttaḥ nirayā parimuttaḥ tiracchāna yoniyā parimuttaḥ petti visayā parimuttaḥ apāya duggati vinipātā

original: Puna caparaṁ, sāriputta, idhekacco puggalo sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṁ mattaso kārī, paññāya mattaso kārī.
analyzed: puna capara sāriputta idha ekaccaḥ puggalo sīlesu paripūra kārī hoti samādhismim mattaso kārī paññāya mattaso kārī

original: So tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṁ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti, sakideva imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvā dukkhassantaṁ karoti.
analyzed: so tiṇṇam sayojanānam parikkhayā rāga dosa mohānam tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti sakideva imam lokam āgantvā dukkhassantam karoti

original: Ayaṁ, sāriputta, chaṭṭho puggalo saupādiseso kālaṁ kurumāno parimutto nirayā …pe… parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
analyzed: sāriputta chaṭṭho puggalo sa aupādiseso kālam kurumāno parimuttaḥ nirayā pe parimuttaḥ apāya duggati vinipātā

original: Puna caparaṁ, sāriputta, idhekacco puggalo sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṁ mattaso kārī, paññāya mattaso kārī.
analyzed: puna capara sāriputta idha ekaccaḥ puggalo sīlesu paripūra kārī hoti samādhismim mattaso kārī paññāya mattaso kārī

original: So tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā ekabījī hoti, ekaṁyeva mānusakaṁ bhavaṁ nibbattetvā dukkhassantaṁ karoti.
analyzed: so tiṇṇam sayojanānam parikkhayā eka bījī hoti ekayā iva mānusakam bhavam nibbattetvā dukkhassa antam karoti

original: Ayaṁ, sāriputta, sattamo puggalo saupādiseso kālaṁ kurumāno parimutto nirayā …pe… parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.
analyzed: sāriputta sattamaḥ puggalo sa aupādisesaḥ kālam kurumānaḥ parimuttaḥ nirayā pe parimuttaḥ apāya duggati vinipātā

analyzed: so tiṇṇam sayojanānam parikkhayā kolaṅkolaḥ hoti dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā sasaritvā dukkhassantam karoti

original: So tiṇṇaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ parikkhayā sattakkhattuparamo hoti, sattakkhattuparamaṁ deve ca manusse ca sandhāvitvā saṁsaritvā dukkhassantaṁ karoti.

original: Ayaṁ, sāriputta, navamo puggalo saupādiseso kālaṁ kurumāno parimutto nirayā parimutto tiracchānayoniyā parimutto pettivisayā parimutto apāyaduggativinipātā.

original: Ke ca, sāriputta, aññatitthiyā paribbājakā bālā abyattā, ke ca saupādisesaṁ vā ‘saupādiseso’ti jānissanti, anupādisesaṁ vā ‘anupādiseso’ti jānissanti.

analyzed: ime kho sāriputta nava puggalā sa aupādisesā kālam kurumānā parimuttā nirayā parimuttā tiracchāna yoniyā parimuttā petti visayā parimuttā apāya duggati vinipātā

original: “Yato kho, gahapati, ariyasāvakassa pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti, catūhi ca sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti, so ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṁ byākareyya:

original: ‘khīṇanirayomhi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto, sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’ti.
analyzed: khīṇa nirayaḥ mhi khīṇa tiracchāna yoni khīṇa petti visayaḥ khīṇa apāya duggati vinipāto so utāpannaḥ ham asmi a vinipāta dhammo niyataḥ sambodhi parāyaṇaḥ ti

original: Katamāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti?
analyzed: katamāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti

original: Yaṁ, gahapati, pāṇātipātī pāṇātipātapaccayā diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati,

original: samparāyikampi bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati, cetasikampi dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti,
analyzed: samparāyikam pi bhayam veram pasavati cetasikam pi dukkham domanassam paṭisavedeti

analyzed: pāṇa atipātā paṭivirataḥ na iva diṭṭhadhammikam pi bhayam veram pasavati na samparāyikam pi

original: bhayaṁ veraṁ pasavati, na cetasikampi dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
analyzed: bhayam veram pasavati na cetasikam pi dukkham domanassam paṭisavedeti

original: Pāṇātipātā paṭiviratassa evaṁ taṁ bhayaṁ veraṁ vūpasantaṁ hoti.
analyzed: pāṇa atipātā paṭiviratassa evam tam bhayam veram vūpasantam hoti

original: Yaṁ, gahapati, adinnādāyī …pe…
analyzed: ya gahapati adinnādāyī pe

original: kāmesumicchācārī …
analyzed: kāmesumicchā cārī

original: musāvādī …
analyzed: musā vādī

analyzed: domanassam paṭisavedeti surā meraya majja pamāda ṭṭhānā paṭivirataḥ na iva diṭṭhadhammikam pi

analyzed: domanassam paṭisavedeti

original: Surāmerayamajjapamādaṭṭhānā paṭiviratassa evaṁ taṁ bhayaṁ veraṁ vūpasantaṁ hoti.
analyzed: surā meraya majja pamāda ṭṭhānā paṭiviratassa evam tam bhayam veram vūpasantam hoti

original: Imāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti.
analyzed: imāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti

original: “Katamehi catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti?
analyzed: katamehi catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgataḥ hoti

original: Idha, gahapati, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti:
analyzed: idha gahapati ariya sāvakaḥ buddhe avecca ppasādena samannāgataḥ hoti

original: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
analyzed: iti pi saḥ bhagavā araham sammāsambuddhaḥ vijjā caraṇa sampanno sugataḥ loka vidū anuttaraḥ purisa damma sārathi satthā deva manussānam buddhaḥ bhagavā ati

original: Dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti:

original: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī’ti.
analyzed: su ākkhātaḥ bhagavatā dhammaḥ sandiṭṭhikaḥ akālikaḥ ehipassikaḥ opaneyyikaḥ paccattam veditabbaḥ viññūhi iti

original: Saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti:
analyzed: saṅghe avecca pasādena samannāgataḥ hoti

original: ‘suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho ujuppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho ñāyappaṭipanno
analyzed: suppaṭipannaḥ bhagavataḥ sāvaka saṅghaḥ uju ppaṭipannaḥ bhagavataḥ sāvaka saṅghaḥ ñāya ppaṭipannaḥ

original: bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho sāmīcippaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho; yadidaṁ cattāri purisayugāni
analyzed: bhagavato sāvaka saṅgho sāmīcippaṭipannaḥ bhagavato sāvaka saṅghaḥ yat idam cattāri purisa yugāni

original: aṭṭha purisapuggalā esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo
analyzed: aṭṭha purisa puggalā esa bhagavato sāvaka saṅgho āhuneyyaḥ pāhuneyyaḥ dakkhiṇeyyaḥ añjali karaṇīyo

original: anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā’ti.
analyzed: anuttaram puññakkhettam lokassa ati

original: Ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi acchiddehi asabalehi akammāsehi bhujissehi viññuppasatthehi aparāmaṭṭhehi samādhisaṁvattanikehi.
analyzed: ariya kantehi sīlehi samannāgataḥ hoti akhaṇḍehi acchiddehi a sabalehi a kammāsehi bhujissehi viññuppasatthehi a parāmaṭṭhehi samādhi savattanikehi

original: Imehi catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti.
analyzed: imehi catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgataḥ hoti

original: Yato kho, gahapati, ariyasāvakassa imāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti, imehi ca catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti, so ākaṅkhamāno attanāva attānaṁ byākareyya:

original: ‘yannūnāhaṁ agatapubbañceva disaṁ gaccheyyaṁ, akhāditapubbāni ca tiṇāni khādeyyaṁ, apītapubbāni ca pānīyāni piveyyan’ti.

original: Sā purimaṁ pādaṁ na suppatiṭṭhitaṁ patiṭṭhāpetvā pacchimaṁ pādaṁ uddhareyya.

original: Sā na ceva agatapubbaṁ disaṁ gaccheyya, na ca akhāditapubbāni tiṇāni khādeyya, na ca apītapubbāni pānīyāni piveyya;
analyzed: sā na ca iva agata pubbam disam gaccheyya na ca a khādita pubbāni tiṇāni khādeyya na ca a pīta pubbāni pānīyāni piveyya

original: yasmiṁ cassā padese ṭhitāya evamassa:

original: ‘yannūnāhaṁ agatapubbañceva disaṁ gaccheyyaṁ, akhāditapubbāni ca tiṇāni khādeyyaṁ, apītapubbāni ca pānīyāni piveyyan’ti tañca padesaṁ na sotthinā paccāgaccheyya.
analyzed: yat nūna aham a gata pubbam ca iva disam gaccheyya a khādita pubbāni ca tiṇāni khādeyya a pīta pubbāni ca pānīyāni piveyyanti tat ca padesam na sotthinā paccāgaccheyya

original: ‘yannūnāhaṁ sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma anantaṁ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja vihareyyan’ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanam samatikkamma anantam viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanam upasampajja vihareyyanti

original: So viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ anabhihiṁsamāno sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: so viññāṇañcāyatanam an abhihisamānaḥ sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanam samatikkamma anantam viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: So taṁ nimittaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti svādhiṭṭhitaṁ adhiṭṭhāti.
analyzed: saḥ tam nimittam āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti svādhiṭṭhitam adhiṭṭhāti

original: Tassa evaṁ hoti:
analyzed: tassa evam hoti

original: ‘yannūnāhaṁ sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja vihareyyan’ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham sabbasas viññāṇañca āyatanam samatikkamma na atthi kiñci iti ākiñcaññāyatanam upasampajja vihareyyanti

original: So ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ anabhihiṁsamāno sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: so ākiñcaññāyatanam an abhihisamānaḥ sabbasas viññāṇañcāyatanam samatikkamma na atthi kiñci iti ākiñcaññāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: So taṁ nimittaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti svādhiṭṭhitaṁ adhiṭṭhāti.
analyzed: saḥ tam nimittam āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti svādhiṭṭhitam adhiṭṭhāti

original: Tassa evaṁ hoti:
analyzed: tassa evam hoti

original: ‘yannūnāhaṁ sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja vihareyyan’ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanam samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam upasampajja vihareyyanti

original: So nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ anabhihiṁsamāno sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: so neva saññā nāsañña āyatanam an abhihisamānaḥ sabbaso ākiñcañña āyatanam samatikkamma neva saññā nāsañña āyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: So taṁ nimittaṁ āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti svādhiṭṭhitaṁ adhiṭṭhāti.
analyzed: saḥ tam nimittam āsevati bhāveti bahulīkaroti svādhiṭṭhitam adhiṭṭhāti

original: Tassa evaṁ hoti:
analyzed: tassa evam hoti

original: ‘yannūnāhaṁ sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ upasampajja vihareyyan’ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham sabbasas nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam samatikkamma saññā vedayita nirodham upasampajja vihareyyanti

original: So saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ anabhihiṁsamāno sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: so saññā vedayita nirodham sabbaso nevasaññā nāsañña āyatanam samatikkamma saññā vedayita nirodham upasampajja viharati

original: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu taṁ tadeva samāpattiṁ samāpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi, tassa mudu cittaṁ hoti kammaññaṁ.
analyzed: yatas kho bhikkhave bhikkhu tam tat eva samāpattim samāpajjati pi vuṭṭhāti pi tassa mudu cittam hoti kammañña

original: Mudunā kammaññena cittena appamāṇo samādhi hoti subhāvito.
analyzed: mudunā kammaññena cittena appamāṇaḥ samādhi hoti su bhāvito

original: So appamāṇena samādhinā subhāvitena yassa yassa abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassa dhammassa
analyzed: so appamāṇena samādhinā su bhāvitena yassa yassa abhiññā sacchikaraṇīyassa dhammassa

original: cittaṁ abhininnāmeti abhiññāsacchikiriyāya tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.
analyzed: cittam abhininnāma iti abhiññā sacchikiriyāya tatra tatra iva sakkhibhabbatam pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane

original: So sace ākaṅkhati: ‘anekavihitaṁ iddhividhaṁ paccanubhaveyyaṁ—ekopi hutvā bahudhā assaṁ, bahudhāpi hutvā eko assaṁ …pe… yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vatteyyan’ti,
analyzed: saḥ sace ākaṅkhati aneka vihitam iddhi vidham paccanubhaveyya ekaḥ api hutvā bahudhā assa bahudhā api hutvā ekaḥ assam pe yāva brahma lokā api kāyena vasam vatteyyanti

original: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.
analyzed: tatra tatra iva sakkhibhabbatam pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane

original: So sace ākaṅkhati: ‘dibbāya sotadhātuyā …pe…

analyzed: tatra tatra iva sakkhibhabbatam pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane

original: So sace ākaṅkhati: ‘anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussareyyaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—ekampi jātiṁ dvepi jātiyo …pe… iti sākāraṁ sauddesaṁ anekavihitaṁ pubbenivāsaṁ anussareyyan’ti,
analyzed: saḥ sace ākaṅkhati aneka vihitam pubbenivāsam anussareyya seyyathīdam ekam pi jātim dve pi jātiyaḥ pe iti sa ākāram sa uddesam aneka vihitam pubbenivāsam anussareyyanti

original: tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṁ pāpuṇāti sati sati āyatane.

original: Tadeva nāma cakkhuṁ bhavissati te rūpā tañcāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedissati.
analyzed: tat eva nāma cakkhum bhavissati te rūpā tat ca āyatanam no paṭisavedissati

original: Tadeva nāma sotaṁ bhavissati te saddā tañcāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedissati.

original: Tadeva nāma ghānaṁ bhavissati te gandhā tañcāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedissati.
analyzed: tat eva nāma ghānam bhavissati te gandhā tat ca āyatanam no paṭisavedissati

original: Sāva nāma jivhā bhavissati te rasā tañcāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedissati.

original: Sova nāma kāyo bhavissati te phoṭṭhabbā tañcāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedissatī”ti.

original: “saññīmeva nu kho, āvuso ānanda, tadāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedeti udāhu asaññī”ti?

original: “Saññīmeva kho, āvuso, tadāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedeti, no asaññī”ti.

analyzed: idha āvuso bhikkhu sabbaso rūpa saññānam samatikkamā paṭigha saññānam atthaṅgamā nānatta saññānam amanasikārā anantaḥ ākāsaḥ ti ākāsānañcāyatanam upasampajja viharati

original: Evaṁsaññīpi kho, āvuso, tadāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedeti.
analyzed: evasaññī ipi kho āvuso tat āyatanam no paṭisaveda iti

original: Puna caparaṁ, āvuso, bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma ‘anantaṁ viññāṇan’ti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.

original: Evaṁsaññīpi kho, āvuso, tadāyatanaṁ no paṭisaṁvedeti.

original: Tasmiṁ, bhikkhave, samaye āraññikassa nāgassa evaṁ hoti:

original: ‘ahaṁ kho etarahi ākiṇṇo viharāmi hatthīhi hatthinīhi hatthikalabhehi hatthicchāpehi.

original: Chinnaggāni ceva tiṇāni khādāmi, obhaggobhaggañca me sākhābhaṅgaṁ khādanti, āvilāni ca pānīyāni pivāmi, ogāhā ca me uttiṇṇassa hatthiniyo kāyaṁ upanighaṁsantiyo gacchanti.
analyzed: chinnaggāni ca iva tiṇāni khādāmi obhagga ubhaggam ca me sākhābhaṅgam khādanti āvilāni ca pānīyāni pivāmi ogāhā ca me uttiṇṇassa hatthiniyaḥ kāyam upanighasantiyaḥ gacchanti

original: Yannūnāhaṁ eko gaṇasmā vūpakaṭṭho vihareyyan’ti.

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā mallesu viharati uruvelakappaṁ nāma mallānaṁ nigamo.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā mallesu viharati uruvelakappam nāma mallānam nigamaḥ

original: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya uruvelakappaṁ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇha samayam nivāsetvā patta cīvaram ādāya uruvelakappam piṇḍāya pāvisi

original: Uruvelakappe piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: uruvela kappe piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantaḥ āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “idheva tāva tvaṁ, ānanda, hohi, yāvāhaṁ mahāvanaṁ ajjhogāhāmi divāvihārāyā”ti.
analyzed: idhā iva tāva tvai ānanda hohi yāvā aham mahā vanam ajjhogāhāmi divāvihārāya ati

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmai ānandaḥ bhagavataḥ paccassosi

original: Atha kho bhagavā mahāvanaṁ ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmiṁ rukkhamūle divāvihāraṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā mahā vanam ajjhogāhetvā aññatarasmin rukkha mūle divāvihāram nisīdi

original: Atha kho tapusso gahapati yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ
analyzed: atha kho tapussaḥ gahapati yena ayasmai ānandaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā

original: ānandaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho tapusso gahapati āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ānandam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho tapussaḥ gahapati āyasmantam ānandam etat avoca

original: “Mayaṁ, bhante ānanda, gihī kāmabhogino kāmārāmā kāmaratā kāmasammuditā.
analyzed: bhante ānanda gihī kāma bhoginī kāma ārāmā kāma ratā kāma sammuditā

original: Tesaṁ no, bhante, amhākaṁ gihīnaṁ kāmabhogīnaṁ kāmārāmānaṁ kāmaratānaṁ kāmasammuditānaṁ papāto viya khāyati, yadidaṁ nekkhammaṁ.
analyzed: tesam naḥ bhante amhākam gihīnam kāma bhogīnam kāma ārāmānam kāma ratānam kāma sammuditānam papātaḥ viya khāyati yat idam nekkhamma

original: Sutaṁ metaṁ, bhante, ‘imasmiṁ dhammavinaye daharānaṁ daharānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ nekkhamme cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati etaṁ santanti passato’.

original: Tayidaṁ, bhante, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye bhikkhūnaṁ bahunā janena visabhāgo, yadidaṁ nekkhamman”ti.

original: Āyāma, gahapati, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamissāma; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocessāma.

original: Yathā no bhagavā byākarissati tathā naṁ dhāressāmā”ti.
analyzed: yathā naḥ bhagavā byākarissati tathā nam dhāressāma ati

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho tapusso gahapati āyasmato ānandassa paccassosi.

analyzed: atha kho āyasmai ānandaḥ tapussena gahapatinā saddhim yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā

analyzed: bhante amhākam gihīnam kāma bhogīnam kāma ārāmānam kāma ratānam kāma sammuditānam papātaḥ

original: Tayidaṁ, bhante, imasmiṁ dhammavinaye bhikkhūnaṁ bahunā janena visabhāgo yadidaṁ nekkhamman’”ti.

original: ‘nevasaññānāsaññāyatane kho me ādīnavo adiṭṭho, so ca me abahulīkato, saññāvedayitanirodhe ca ānisaṁso anadhigato, so ca me anāsevito.
analyzed: nevasaññānāsaññāyatane kho me ādīnavaḥ adiṭṭho saḥ ca me a bahulīkato saññā vedayita nirodhe ca ānisasaḥ anadhigato saḥ ca me anāsevito

original: Tasmā me saññāvedayitanirodhe cittaṁ na pakkhandati nappasīdati na santiṭṭhati na vimuccati etaṁ santanti passato’.

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, ānanda, etadahosi:
analyzed: tassa mayhaḥ ānanda etat ahosi

original: ‘sace kho ahaṁ nevasaññānāsaññāyatane ādīnavaṁ disvā taṁ bahulaṁ kareyyaṁ, saññāvedayitanirodhe

original: ānisaṁsaṁ adhigamma tamāseveyyaṁ, ṭhānaṁ kho panetaṁ vijjati yaṁ me saññāvedayitanirodhe

original: cittaṁ pakkhandeyya pasīdeyya santiṭṭheyya vimucceyya etaṁ santanti passato’.

original: So kho ahaṁ, ānanda, aparena samayena nevasaññānāsaññāyatane ādīnavaṁ disvā taṁ bahulamakāsiṁ, saññāvedayitanirodhe ānisaṁsaṁ adhigamma tamāseviṁ.
analyzed: saḥ kho aha ānanda aparena samayena nevasaññā nāsañña āyatane ādīnavam disvā tam bahulam akāsi saññā vedayita nirodhe ānisasam adhigamma tam āsevi

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, ānanda, saññāvedayitanirodhe cittaṁ pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati etaṁ santanti passato.
analyzed: tassa mayhaḥ ānanda saññā vedayita nirodhe cittam pakkhandati pasīdati santiṭṭhati vimuccati etam santanti passato

original: So kho ahaṁ, ānanda, sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṁ upasampajja viharāmi, paññāya ca me disvā āsavā parikkhayaṁ agamaṁsu.
